attributes.action: Refuse to offer 30 hour funding in England until business rates are cut
attributes.additional_details: Evidence shows nurseries are struggling to stay open.
attributes.background: Childcare settings are struggling to stay open, England need to follow Scotland and Wales and support childcare providers.

rejection.details:
You seem to be asking childcare settings to take action and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to reduce business rates for childcare settings if that is something you would like to see happen.
